document.full_text: new york city livery cab drivers, often called to crime-ridden neighborhoods that yellow taxis tend to ignore, are being armed with bulletproof vests, an advocacy group said on tuesday.
document.title: some new york city cab driver to wear bulletproof vests
lines_and_colors: new york city livery cab drivers, often called to crime-ridden neighborhoods that yellow taxis tend to ignore, are being armed with bulletproof vests, an advocacy group said on tuesday.
